description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Help the ninjabread men save as many civilians as they can. The longer they make their stand against the endless demon hoard the more time they buy for the civilians to escape harm. How long can you last and how many civilians can you save?
description.short: Help the ninjabread men save as many civilians as they can. The longer they make their stand against the endless demon hoard the more time they buy for the civilians to escape harm. How long can you last and how many civilians can you save?
